page.title: 16Local Businesses
page.content: Mr.Potter _ Upholsterer ======================= Mr.Potter is an upholsterer.He makes headboards,bed_room stools,foot stools bed side cabinets,and ottomans. There are a lot of things he repairs like chairs and settees.He repairs and makes things with chipboard,hardboard, softwood,foam,dralon,velvet,fibreglass lining,vinyl and trimmings. He has special tools to make these,things like a button making machine.It cost roughly Â£65.To make a button you will need top and bottom of your button. Then you will need a good piece of cloth,velvet is the best sort to use. Then you put a piece of your velvet then a sharp piece of metal on to the machine.Then you will turn the handle to cut your velvet.You put the button and cloth into the machine,turn the handle,bang it and you have a button.
